definition.name: Generate Dependabot Glob
definition.description: Creates a `dependabot.yml` dynamically based on glob patterns.
definition.author: github

inputs.name: template-file
inputs.description: Location of the file to use as template

inputs.name: follow-symbolic-links
inputs.description: Indicates whether to follow symbolic links (If you want to put your template in a weird place)

inputs.name: file-header
inputs.description: Header to add to the generated file. ${input-name} will be replaced with the value of the given input.
inputs.default:
# This file was generated by the "Generate Dependabot Glob" action. Do not edit it directly.
# Make changes to `${template-file}` and a PR will be automatically created.
